1.title: The Wicked Woods
1.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that takes you on a terrifying journey into The Wicked Woods. From haunted houses to werewolves controlled by light switches this is one scary compilation you won't want to miss.

2.title: Trouble in Paradise
2.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that focuses on couples experiencing Trouble In Paradise. From booze-soaked marriages to blood thirsty divorces, this is one compilation you won't want to miss.

3.title: Bleak Beginnings
3.plot: A carefully curated collection of thought provoking short films about children struggling through Bleak Beginnings. From escaping slavery to fleeing cults, this is a powerful series of shorts you won't want to miss.

4.title: Tour de Film
4.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films about cycling fanatics in this Tour De Film special. Amongst this compilation is "Retour" starring Matthias Schoenaerts ("Rust and Bone").

5.title: Precocious Kids
5.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films about Precocious Kids. From imaginary friends to parents abducted by the Queen, this is one compilation you won't want to miss.

6.title: Dark Desires
6.plot: A carefully curated collection of provocative short films about our Dark Desires. From fondling factory workers to unfaithful brides, this is one steamy compilation you won't want to miss.

7.title: Women of War
7.plot: A carefully curated collection of intense short films all about the Women of War. From besieged mothers to gun-toting girls, this is one compilation that will have you gripped from beginning to end.

8.title: Family Ties
8.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films all about Family Ties. From estranged parents to siblings burying their dad, this is one classic compilation that you won't want to miss.

9.title: Ghostly Getaways
9.plot: A carefully curated collection of terrifying short films all about Ghostly Getaways. From devil-infested ponds to houses that cry blood, this is one chilling compilation that you won't want to miss.

10.title: Wedding Wonders
10.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films all about Wedding Wonders. From naughty nuptials to unruly unions, this is one wedding day compilation that you won't want to miss.

11.title: Born to Be Wild
11.plot: A carefully curated collection of thought-provoking short films all about youths who were Born to be Wild. From runaway rebels to tumultuous teens, this is one compilation that you won't want to miss.

1.title: Life Lessons
1.plot: In this series, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present the very best from the world of short film. This episode features a carefully curated selection of shorts about Life Lessons including "Three-Fifty", "The Faucet" and more.

2.title: Hitting the Headlines
2.plot: In this series, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present the very best from the world of short film. This episode features a carefully curated selection of shorts focusing on important issues including "Teardrop", "Binges" and more.

3.title: Cutting Edge Animation
3.plot: In this series, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present the very best from the world of short film. This episode features a carefully curated selection of Cutting-Edge Animated shorts including "Inner City", "Jorka", "Tim" and more.

4.title: Animated & R-Rated
4.plot: In this series, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present the very best from the world of short film. This episode features a carefully curated selection of Animated and R-Rated shorts including "Junkyard", "Tussilago" and more.

5.title: Music and Lyrics
5.plot: In this series, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present the very best from the world of short film. This episode features a carefully curated selection of melodic and musical movies featuring "DENTAL BREAKDOWN", "ZOMBO" and more.

6.title: Stadium Stars
6.plot: In this series, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present the very best from the world of short film. This episode features a carefully curated selection of soccer themed shorts featuring "RONALDO", "ONE GOAL" and more.

7.title: Twists & Turns
7.plot: In this episode, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present a carefully curated collection of superb short films that will keep you on the edge of your seat from beginning to end, with twists and turns that you won't see coming.

8.title: Looking for Love
8.plot: In this episode, Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor present a carefully curated collection of superb short films that will woo you, romance you and sweep you off your feet. But will it be heartbreak or a happy ending for these lovers...?

9.title: Family Matters
9.plot: In this episode, a carefully curated collection of superb short films about Family Matters are presented. From drug-taking geriatrics to arm wrestling parents, these shorts will make you laugh, cringe and cry in the way only a family can.

10.title: Superhumans
10.plot: In this episode, a carefully curated collection of superhuman short films are presented. From fist fighting homeless heroes to supervillain support groups, this series of shorts will floor you, charm you and take you up, up and away.

11.title: Coming of Age
11.plot: In this episode, a carefully curated collection of superb short films are presented. From awkward adolescence to comedic characters, these Coming of Age short films will make you laugh, cry and maybe even help you grow up a little.

12.title: Dark Days
12.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films about Dark Days. From mind-controlling angels to high octane motorcycle chases, these exciting short films will have you on the edge of your seat taking you to the end of the world and beyond.

1.title: Middle Eastern Special
1.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films focusing on important and powerful stories from the Middle East. This eclectic and compelling compilation includes the Oscar nominated Buzkashi Boys.

2.title: Single Mom Struggles
2.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that show the struggles single moms can face from day to day. These hard-hitting dramas will move you, inspire you and leave you reeling long after they finish.

3.title: Golden Years
3.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that celebrate the Golden Years. From basketball playing grandmas to booze smuggling pensioners, these hilarious and moving short films show that you're never too old to have fun.

4.title: Food for Thought
4.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that focus on Food For Thought. From culinary comedy to delicious drama, these hilarious and moving short films are for all your acquired tastes.

5.title: Oddballs and Outcasts
5.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films celebrating the Oddballs and the Outcasts of life. From a boy with oversized hands to a man with OCD looking for love on a sex line, this is one series of shorts you won't want to miss.

6.title: Delusion & Confusion
6.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films designed to delude, confuse and intrigue. From demon-possessed CEOs to supernaturally-powered receptionists, this is one series of shorts you won't want to miss.

7.title: School Daze
7.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films taking it back to the old school. From deformed bird-boys to obscene classroom drawings, this one series of shorts you won't want to miss.

8.title: Two Timers
8.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films designed to seduce and make you stray from home. From unfaithful air hostesses to sadistic jilted lovers, this is one selection of short films you won't want to miss.

9.title: Trainspotting
9.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films showing how lives can be changed and even destroyed during one single train journey. Includes the Oscar winning Six Shooter starring Brendon Gleeson from writer-director Martin McDonagh.

10.title: Spaced Out
10.plot: A carefully curated collection of Spaced Out short films. From cosmonauts planting stars on earth to astronauts travelling deep into black holes, these epic short films will take you to the edge of the galaxy and beyond.

11.title: Strange But True
11.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films telling true stories that will defy your disbelief and blow your mind. Featuring the Oscar nominated short film Cavedigger.

12.title: Price of Fame
12.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that prove that the price of fame sometimes isn't worth paying. From retired adventurers to naked rock stars this is a selection of short films that you won't want to miss.

1.title: Dark and Droll
1.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that will take you Above and Beyond. Featuring The Alpha Invention starring Lord of the Ring's Billy Boyd, and A Message from Outer Space starring Rust and Bone's Matthias Schoenaerts.

2.title: Above and Beyond
2.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that are, each in their own way, dark and droll. Featuring the BAFTA winning Pitch Black Heist, starring X-Men's Michael Fassbender and Game of Throne's Liam Cunningham.

3.title: Read All About It
3.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that focuses on topical subjects in this Read All About It countdown. From homeless hunters to brawling boxers this is one thought provoking compilation you won't want to miss.

4.title: Hot and Steamy
4.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that is sure to get you Hot and Steamy. From naughty doormen to forbidden fruit this is one sexy compilation you won't want to miss.

5.title: Period Pieces
5.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that focuses on Period Pieces. Featuring The Zebra Man, directed by The Girl With The Pearl Earring's Peter Webber and starring Minnie Driver.

6.title: True Detectives
6.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films all about True Detectives. Featuring X Returns, starring Fifty Shades of Grey's Jamie Dornan and Taken's Holly Valance.

7.title: Mad Musicians
7.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films all about Mad Musicians. Featuring Trading Licks, starring V for Vendetta's Roger Allam.

8.title: Wild Wild West
8.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that will take you to the Wild Wild West. Featuring Wild Horses starring World War Z's Mireille Enos with a Guest Appearance by Brooke Shields.

9.title: Love and Loss
9.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that takes you on a heart-breaking journey of Love and Loss. Featuring the BAFTA nominated Connect by Samuel Abrahams this is one charming and emotional compilation you won't want to miss.

10.title: Dog Days
10.plot: A superb collection of short films that takes you on a barking mad journey through Dog Days. From the Meryl Streep voiced Higglety Pigglety Pop to the Oscar nominated Guard Dog, this is one canine compilation you won't want to miss.

11.title: Fading Memories
11.plot: We have teamed up with hundreds of female filmmakers worldwide to bring you a unique collection of short films. These moving short films remind us that the memory of loved family members can never be erased if we strive to keep them alive.

12.title: Weird Worlds
12.plot: A carefully curated collection of short films that invite you into Weird Worlds. Featuring the award winning Stanley Pickle, this is one incredible compilation you won't want to miss.

imdb.plot outline: Join Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor for The Short List, the show providing a hand-picked selection of five handpicked short films sure to tickle your fancy. From festival favorites to crowd-winners, this is one show you won't want to miss. Featuring comedy, drama, romance, action, horror - you name it, we've got it. That's The Short List.
imdb.title: The Short List
plot: Join Ivan Berry and Ashley McKinney-Taylor for _The Short List_ (qv), the show providing a hand-picked selection of five handpicked short films sure to tickle your fancy.
